House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00042
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REMOVING THE CONDITIONS FOR THE CONDONATION OF ALL UNPAID TAXES DUE FROM LOCAL WATER DISTRICTS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 289-A OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED
SHORT TITLE : Removing The Conditions For The Condonation Of All Unpaid Taxes Due From Local Water Districts
ABSTRACT : Removes the conditions for the condonation of all unpaid taxes due from local water districts (LWDs) and the documentary requirements prescribed under Republic Act No. 10026, thereby granting a one-time general amnesty of condonation of taxes involving LWDs.
